passive.name: Unfulfilled Yearning
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and increases their Max HP by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.
